title: DOJ Sends Musk’s PAC Warning Over $1 Million Voter Lottery | U. S. Politics | Before It's News
text: DOJ Sends Musk’s PAC Warning Over $1 Million Voter Lottery CDN – https://www.conservativedailynews.com by [Mariane Angela](/v3/r2/?url=aHR0cHM6Ly93d3cuY29uc2VydmF0aXZlZGFpbHluZXdzLmNvbS9hdXRob3IvbWFyaWFuZV9hbmdlbGEv) at [CDN](/v3/r2/?url=aHR0cHM6Ly93d3cuQ29uc2VydmF0aXZlRGFpbHlOZXdzLmNvbQ==) - These payments might breach laws against compensating people to register or vote in elections involving federal candidates, according to the DOJ’s letter, WSJ reported.
